thread.title: 8 of the best wallets you can buy for under $30 right now
thread.title_full: 8 of the best wallets you can buy for under $30 right now

author: Tyler Lauletta (feedback@businessinsider.com)
title: 8 of the best wallets you can buy for under $30 right now
text:
You have successfully emailed the post. 8 of the best wallets you can buy for under $30 right now Feb. 6, 2017, 5:49 PM 260 
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships so we get a share of the revenue from your purchase. 
Amazon 
Whether you’re carrying cash, cards, or both, it’s important for every guy to have a quality wallet. 
Wallets are important; they’re one of the few things (along with your wallet and keys), that you carry with you almost everywhere you go. 
Since you end up spending so much time with your wallet, it makes sense to take the time to find one that you really like. 
We’ve collected some of our favorite wallets that cost under $30, so you'll be able to get a new wallet and still have money to fill it with. Distil Union Amazon 
My Dad has been a wallet minimalist as long as I’ve known him — for Father’s Day my sister and I used to color rubber bands for him, and they would become his “wallets” for as long as they would hold. 
I got him the Wally Micro for his birthday last year and so far he has been a big fan. Dopp Amazon 
If you’re looking for a minimalist wallet that still has enough space for both cards and cash, this slim piece from Dopp is a great option. Columbia Amazon 
If you’re looking for an affordable bifold, this Columbia wallet comes with tons of space for everything you might need to fit in your pockets.
